title: How would it affect the way you live without media? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, of course the human race developed for many many centuries without media. Media itself is a very new and short-lived feature of life, so far. Life without media for those who grew up with it would be quite challenging, but survivable. The durable human race would figure it out and move forward in some fashion best portrayed by fiction writers. Which fiction will actually become fact? I’d prefer not to find out. Call me media man.
Wouldn't effect me at all we grew up not having Media cell phone or internet. So if that were something that I had too let go most definitely could handle it
